subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Jimmie Johnson survived tire troubles, holding off Carl Edwards over a seven-lap green flag run to the finish line of the Sprint Cup Allstate 400 at the Brickyard.
snippet: Jimmie Johnson survived tire troubles, holding off Carl Edwards over a seven-lap green flag run to the finish line of the Sprint Cup Allstate 400 at the Brickyard.
